A long time Maine resident and outdoor enthusiast, Warren LaBaire fell in love with capturing the beauty of nature in photographs. His lifelong career in horticulture and hobby bird watching fueled the fire that would soon grow into a new calling. He loves fishing and often finds himself engulfed in Mother Nature's glory. You can find him on the ice, along a river, walking in the wilderness, or riding his motorcycle. He loves his family, his dog and cat and his wonderful wife!

My interest in photography came to me later in life but has given me untold hours of enjoyment and the ability to express my creative side that I never knew I had.
